keyPolicies.policyDescription: Smarter and better transport solutions are vital to our area, with its strategic location at the heart of the economy. Breaking the funding log-jam for road improvements such as the A1, ensure sound route decisions for East West Rail, and pressing for better service on commuter lines to London.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: ENSURING ACCESSIBLE SERVICES ACROSS NORTH EAST BEDFORDSHIRE
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Developing and supporting GP services, campaigning for increased funding for rural policing and securing investments for high speed broadband.
Working with our broad range of local communities and councils to ensure that their voice is heard in protecting their environment and quality of life, while meeting additional housing needs.
